Public Class Title Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IDisposable
type Title = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示整個圖表影像的標題。

span.span: Represents a title for the entire chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝的標題的所有功能控制項。The class encapsulates all the functionality of a title for the control. 這個類別會使用公開集合屬性的根物件。This class is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意數目的整個圖表影像的標題。There can be any number of titles for an entire chart image. 標題便能夠：Titles are able to: - 是停駐和對齊或自訂定位。Be docked and aligned or custom-positioned. - 內部或繪製的圖表區域外部顯示。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 使用預先定義這類或。Use a predefined such as or . - 使用影線、 漸層色彩和背景影像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 調整大小並放在圖表影像內的任何位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the title.

value.span: 值，表示標題的背景色彩。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of the title.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值將會是如果您已指定背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果您設定此色彩為 「 透明 」 — 也就是如果您使用的 alpha 值為 0-沒有色彩會指派給標題的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 如此一來，背景就是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題背景漸層的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

summary.span: 此外，也會判斷是否使用漸層。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 表示標題背景漸層方向的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a title.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以判斷是否標題會顯示在漸層，以決定漸層的方向，如果有一個使用的屬性。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: 設定主要標題背景色彩與屬性。Set the primary color of the title background with the property. 設定標題背景的次要色彩屬性。Set the secondary color of the title background with the property. 設定此的所需的漸層樣式的屬性。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 指定標題影線樣式的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style for the title.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉會指定使用類型的筆刷的影線樣式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製線條。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 如需可用的影線樣式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **附註**影線線條的色彩由屬性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的背景影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the title.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑標題，並可以是絕對或相對 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a title, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要調整影像的位置，請使用和屬性。To position the image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定其中一個設定為 「 透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩屬性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 影像是任何支援的.NET Framework，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層停駐的色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 值，指定繪製背景影像時以透明方式繪製的色彩。

span.span: A value that specifies the color that will be drawn as transparent when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉譯圖表時，將顯示此色彩為透明。This color will be displayed as transparent when the chart is rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode BackImageWrapMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartImageWrapMode value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定標題背景影像的繪製模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 指定標題背景影像繪圖模式的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of the title.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您決定如何顯示映像，映像可以並排顯示，縮放，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果調整映像，將會自動縮放以符合項目的範圍內。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the title. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從左上角的標題。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the title. 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置由屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題背景的次要色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the title background.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這屬性會決定的次要背景色彩的數個相關屬性的其中一個物件，並套用漸層色彩時，會使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 您可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定標題的影線線條的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the title. 若要使用的標題的背景的漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for the background of a title: - 設定使用的主要色彩屬性。Set the primary color with the property. - 設定與次要色彩屬性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 設定的所需的漸層樣式的屬性。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以固定到頂端、 左邊、 底部或右邊的整個圖表影像或內部或圖表區域外部。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果屬性設定為`false`，停駐套用至整個圖表影像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果屬性設定為`true`，停駐適用於所指定的物件屬性If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性未設定為。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標指定標題是否應停駐於 物件內部。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the title should be docked within a object.

value.span: 如果標題將停駐於圖表區域內部，則為 ，如果標題將停駐於圖表區域外部，則為 。

span.span: if the title will be docked within a chart area; if the title will be docked outside the chart area.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`，標題停駐在外部邊緣繪製的圖表區域; 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，標題會以內部停駐於圖表區域的邊緣。If the property is set to `false`, the title is docked to the outside edge of the plotted chart areas; if this property is set to `true`, the title will be docked to the inside edge of the chart area. 這個屬性會有任何作用，如果名稱物件不指派給屬性。This property will have no effect if the name of a object is not assigned to the property. **附註**這種行為僅適用於屬性設定為。**Note** This behavior only applies if the property is set to . 如果這不是這樣，則設定屬性會有任何作用，因為標題的位置會決定其屬性值。If this is not the case, setting the property has no effect, because the position of the title is then determined by the property value.

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的唯一名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 值，表示標題物件的唯一名稱。

span.span: A value that represents the unique name of the title object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標題物件的名稱必須是唯一的。否則會擲回例外狀況。The name of a title object must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 這個屬性可用來當做索引子擷取時物件從物件。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果這個屬性設定為零長度字串，就會擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ Position { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來取得或設定標題的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which can be used to get or set the position of the title.

value.span: 值，表示標題的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the position of the title.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性為自動 (亦即 Title.Position.Auto = `true`) 標題位置會自動計算控制項，並考慮，和屬性設定。If the property is automatic (that is, Title.Position.Auto = `true`) the title position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不是自動的，並屬性會被忽略，並由傳回的值單獨決定標題位置物件。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the title position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color for the title.

value.span: 指定標題陰影色彩的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies the shadow color for the title.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到 「 真實 」 的遮蔽效果;請嘗試 「 128,0,0,0"陰影的色彩值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作一個陰影，將屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the title.

value.span: 值，表示標題的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作的遮蔽功能，請將這個屬性設為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值會移到右邊; 陰影負值會導致移位至左邊的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

summary.span: 取得或設定標題的文字樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 列舉值，決定標題的文字樣式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the style of the text for the title.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有五個可能的樣式的標題文字： ， ， ， ，和。There are five possible styles for title text: , , , , and . 請參閱下表摘要這些樣式：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |樣式Style|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |預設Default|使用所需的字型和色彩，使用任何其他的效果會顯示文字。Text is displayed using the desired font and color, with no additional effects.| |陰影Shadow|文字會顯示已新增的陰影效果的文字中使用的所需的字型和色彩。Text is displayed using the desired font and color with an added shadow effect on the text.| |浮凸Emboss|文字會顯示使用所需的字型和色彩但繪製含有 embossing 效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embossing effect.| |內嵌Embed|文字會顯示使用所需的字型和色彩但繪製含有內嵌效果。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn with an embedding effect.| |FrameFrame|文字會顯示使用所需的字型和色彩但繪製為外框的文字，也就是使用沒有填滿。Text is displayed using the desired font and color but drawn as an outline of the text, that is, with no fill.|
